name: Movies, Movies, Movies Quiz | 2000s Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What movie stars Tom Hanks and features Helen Hunt?
What movie plots a life lesson of a Wall Street genius taking a 'glimpse' of what life would've been like if he had stayed with his college girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Family Man.

	Excellent movie, in my opinion!

questions.text: What airport was Ben Affleck's character in 'Bounce' delayed in?
questions.explanation:
Chicago, O'Hare.

	This is where he graciously trades in his own ticket of death for a one night stand.

questions.text: In 'Save the Last Dance' what city are the Juliard auditions held in while Sarah is living with her father?
In what flick, sporting its share of Golden Globe nominations, does the local mayor or Comte attempt to snub the sinful, single mother and her daughter out of his small village?
In what movie does Winona Ryder attempt to stop the transcendence of the antichrist into a human body?
questions.explanation:
Lost Souls.

	Not exactly a winner at the box office.

questions.text: The Plot: After witnessing the murder of her husband, shocked and determined widow takes a journey to reunite with her non-existent soap star husband. The Movie:
questions.explanation:
Nurse Betty & 'Nurse Betty'.

	Renee Zellweger held the role of an interesting character in this entertaining flick.

questions.text: Other than Penelope Cruz, who also co-stars with Matt Damon in 'All the Pretty Horses'?
questions.explanation:
Henry Thomas.

	He was Elliot in 'E.T.'

questions.text: How many scenes do Catherine Zeta-Jones and Michael Douglas have together in 'Traffic'?
What did Bagger Vance help his subject regain?
questions.explanation:
His swing.

	His golf swing that is!
